arts.ttl: Harry Kane continues scoring streak as Bayern beat Club Brugge
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham also struck for the first time this season in a narrow Real Madrid win

arts.ttl: Bayern cruise to 4-0 win over Club Brugge
arts.sum: FC Bayern Munich put on a masterclass at the Allianz Arena, defeating Club Brugge 4–0 in their Champions League clash. With clinical finishing and relentless attacking pressure, the hosts sent a clear message in the league-phase competition.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Club Brugge – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich host Club Brugge in the UEFA Champions League tonight. The German champions are aiming to continue their perfect record in all competitions so far this season. Bayern Munich vs Club Brugge – Predicted lineup and team news Bayern team news Vincent Kompany is dealing with defensive absentees for tonight’s clash. arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Club Brugge – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich will aim to maintain their perfect start to the 2025–26 season when they host Club Brugge at the Allianz Arena on Wednesday as Vincent Kompany’s side looks to make it three wins from three in Group B of the UEFA Champions League. arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs. Club Brugge: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich will look to make it three wins from three in the UEFA Champions League this season when they host Club Brugge at the Allianz Arena on Wednesday (kick-off: 9pm CEST). Remarkably, they maintained their 100 percent record in all competitions in 2025/26 on Bundesliga Matchday 7 as they defeated Borussia Dortmund in Der Klassiker, prevailing 2-1 thanks to goals from Harry Kane and Michael Olise .

arts.ttl: Serge Gnabry misses Bayern's final training session ahead of Club Brugge clash
arts.sum: Serge Gnabry is unlikely to return to the starting XI against Club Brugge after missing FC Bayern's final training session ahead of the game.
Jack Ogalbe has provided his best tips for all 18 games on matchday three of the Champions League
